definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan was present at the meetings.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇出席了午餐會。

sentences.english: Edith helm was not invited to these intimate luncheons .
sentences.chinese: 伊迪絲赫爾姆沒有被邀請出度反映親密關係的午餐會。

sentences.english: Thanks for suggesting a lunch meeting.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你提議開一個午餐會。

sentences.english: Encourage them to join lunchtime or after-school clubs.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵他們加入午餐會或是課後團體。

sentences.english: And then there are the luncheons.
sentences.chinese: 然後，這些午餐會出現了。

sentences.english: I confirm that I/ the participant has read through and will adhere to the Rules and Regulations of Lunch and Pandas Programme.
sentences.chinese: 參加者已詳閱及會遵守熊貓午餐會活動之守則及規條。

sentences.english: It is customary for the governor of the site district to bring greetings at the luncheon.
sentences.chinese: 當地的地區總監在午餐會上致歡迎辭是一種慣例。

sentences.english: It gives me great pleasure to attend this luncheon, meeting all the friends, old and new.
sentences.chinese: 很高興出席今天的午餐會，與新老朋友歡聚一堂。

definition: Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Gong1 hui4 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: Xi Jinping (1953-), PRC politician, General Secretary of the CCP from 2012, president of the PRC from 2013

pinyin: Ya4 Tai4 Jing1 He2 Zu3 zhi1

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
(Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4
